speech.default.gatehouse.angry.swarms: They say you can judge a dungeon by the size of its insect infestation.
speech.default.temple.of.the.gate.end: Well, we have slain, battled and sneaked our way to the ultimate prize - the Great Gate out of this Realm. No doubt the Third Realm will be even more dangerous.
speech.default.plain.of.pillars.intro: Not a lot of cover here. This place doesn't suit my fighting style.
speech.scouting.spot.stash: I think something is hidden here. One of you lot have a look around.
speech.default.ichiba.crossroad.mantis.glen: Hey, what do you lot think the most dangerous thing in these woods is? How long do you think before we meet it?
speech.default.gnoll.village.intro: Savages. But not to be underestimated. I saw no spoor - they have skilled woodcraft. Those gnolls that I can see all have weapons close at hand. Best we do the same.
speech.encounter.start.hard: Perhaps this is how it ends.
speech.default.danaos.castle.intro: These guys are well armed. I guess they're expecting trouble. Let's not be that trouble - I don't think I can kill them all in one go.
speech.default.ichiba.city.gnome.garden: A cute patch of grass this, for the middle of a slum. I wonder who looks after it?
speech.default.gatehouse.malignant.widows: Shhh... I don't like the silence that's coming from behind that door. It's a dangerous kind of silence.
speech.condition.hex: I'm feeling my efficiency impaired by something.
speech.default.gatehouse.1:
It appears that the entrance to the Second Realm is some sort of dungeon. Fair enough, several less pleasant alternatives spring to mind.

The floor in this room is dusty and no foot prints or other disturbances are evident.  Whoever the denizens of this Realm are, they do not seem to frequent this part of it.
speech.default.stygios.forest.intro: Normally I'm the quietest thing around, but this forest gives me the creeps. Feels something out there is already stalking us.
speech.default.ichiba.crossroad.hidden.stuff.1: Looks like we have remains from a bunch of people here. People who dies from violent injuries. Otherwise not much exciting.

name: Gung Ho
description: Bold and bravo. A bit of an Indiana Jones.

speech.encounter.win.normal: You think they'd learn not to mess with the hero of the story.
speech.condition.disease: It's not the years, honey; it's the mileage.
speech.condition.nausea: Feels like the time I didn't purify the drinking water properly.
speech.encounter.win.hard: We were pretty lucky there people. Well, you lot were lucky, I was just good.
speech.condition.plyze: Why don't I just sit down? It'll be more comfortable.
speech.default.gatehouse.deactivated.portal: A portal? Fantastic! Let's get it going and get outta here!
speech.default.gatehouse.hidden.stuff.1: Poor soul didn't make it, but we will.
speech.default.gatehouse.block.golem: Hey, if it's just decoration, maybe we can nick a few gems off it.
speech.personality.selected: Fortune and glory, kid. Gimme a torch and let's get going.
speech.character.recruited: Ok people. We do not follow maps to buried treasure and X never, ever marks the spot.
speech.ally.dies.female: The biggest trouble with her was the noise.
speech.default.ichiba.crossroad.intro: Tropical paradise, eh? I bet there's a village or a hidden temple around here. Let's follow that path!
speech.condition.web: When I get outta this gunk I'm gonna come and break your head!
speech.condition.blind: Don't worry, I've got a vivid imagination.
speech.ally.dies.male: We've lost a good man today.
speech.resurrected: Here I am, walking back through your door.
speech.default.gatehouse.shrine.garret: Honor to the Wayfarer. Let's keep moving - there's more adventure ahead.
speech.default.gatehouse.dark.cobweb.area: Dusty, cobweb-ridden halls! Reminds me of that crypt under Ponang. Fun times! Let's press on, the thrill awaits!
speech.encounter.start.easy: I think you just brought a knife to a gunfight, kid.
speech.last.man.standing: You want to talk to God? Let's go see him together, I've got nothing better to do.
speech.condition.insane.1: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
speech.condition.insane.2: WA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!
speech.condition.insane.3: AAAAA!!! HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HAH!
speech.default.gatehouse.angry.swarms: Well, look who decided to join the party!
speech.scouting.spot.stash: Hey, let's look around a bit here and see what we can find!
speech.condition.poison: Snakes. Why did it have to be snakes?
speech.default.ichiba.crossroad.mantis.glen:
Anyone else got that ‘being watched’ feeling? 

I say we pick up the pace.
speech.melee.attack.2: This is gonna hurt you a lot more than it's gonna hurt me.
speech.encounter.start.hard: Fortune and glory, kid. Fortune and glory.
speech.melee.attack.1: Hang on, lady, we're going for a ride.
speech.default.gatehouse.malignant.widows: Smells like trouble on the other side. I bet there's something nasty waiting for us.
speech.encounter.start.normal: Bring 'em on! I prefer a straight fight to all this sneakin' around.
speech.default.gatehouse.1: Second Realm, first impressions: not great. But hey, no turning back now! Let's see what this dungeon's hiding.
speech.badly.wounded: This is usually when the ground falls out from beneath my feet.
speech.inventory.heavy.load: Why are we carrying all this crap?
